features.name: skill-md
features.description: Create SKILL.md with frontmatter, onboarding flow, and core instructions

features.name: init-script
features.description: Create scripts/init_typing.py to initialize typing setup in a project
features.test: Script runs successfully and creates expected files

features.name: analyze-script
features.description: Create scripts/analyze_typing.py to analyze error distribution
features.test: Script runs and outputs error breakdown

features.name: rule-assets
features.description: Create assets/rules/ with 4 typing discipline rules
features.test: All 4 rule files exist with valid format

features.name: patterns-reference
features.description: Create references/patterns.md with common fix patterns
features.test: File covers all 6 layers from spec

features.name: faq-reference
features.test: All FAQ questions from spec are covered

features.name: readme
features.test: README covers installation, usage, and examples

features.name: test-fixtures
features.description: Create test fixtures: untyped, partial, third_party Python projects
features.test: Each fixture has expected pyright error count

features.name: test-init
features.description: Create test_init.py - tests init_typing.py creates correct files

features.name: test-analyze
features.description: Create test_analyze.py - tests analyze_typing.py parses output correctly

features.name: test-config
features.description: Create pytest config and CI workflow
